allow:
Bash(gh release create v1.0.0 "./installer/DS_ClaudeClient-v1.0.0-x64.msi" --title "DS Claude Client v1.0.0" --notes "$(cat <<''EOF''
## DS Claude Client v1.0.0

A custom Windows desktop client for Claude AI with enhanced features.

### Features
- Embedded Claude.ai via WebView2
- Enhanced text input area with Shift+Enter/Ctrl+Enter to send
- Message history dialog with copy to clipboard
- Resizable snippets panel with search, sort, drag-drop reorder
- Import/export snippets as JSON
- Configurable fonts (including JetBrains Mono, Cascadia Code)
- Always on top toggle
- Settings persistence (window size, position, fonts, panels)

### Installation
1. Download `DS_ClaudeClient-v1.0.0-x64.msi`
2. Run the installer
3. Launch from Start Menu or Desktop shortcut

### Requirements
- Windows 10 version 1809 or later
- WebView2 Runtime (usually pre-installed on Windows 10/11)
EOF
)")
